summary: The module defines a mixin that equips diffusion model components with the ability to load, initialize, release, and control the scaling of Image Prompt (IP) adapters, handling model file resolution, state‑dict loading (including safetensors), and optional PEFT integration.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless incorporation and runtime management of IP adapters in diffusion pipelines, allowing developers to enhance image generation models with adaptable prompt conditioning while abstracting low‑level loading and scaling details.
